name: Naut, And Some Switch He Found In The Woods
name_original: Naut, And Some Switch He Found In The Woods
description:
Naut uses it to fight baddies and get around! Switch between using it as a weapon and a navigation tool. Stick it into the ground, wall, or ceiling, and fling yourself around this first level. Or, throw it at your enemies!

Requires Gamepad. Gamecube and Xbox are supported, although Xbox was not tested. (I don't even own an xbox controller).

Everything devleoped by Keola Silva/Datanaut, with these exceptions:

- Credit to Ben Macklin and Le Flex on Soundcloud for their track "Escape"

- Credit to the author for their forest platformer tileset. http://opengameart.org/content/free-platformer-game-tileset
